metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Node.js can be used in database applications.
content.html: Node.js can be used in database applications.

content.text: One of the most popular NoSQL database is MongoDB.
content.html: One of the most popular NoSQL database is MongoDB.

content.text: To be able to experiment with the code examples, you will need access to a MongoDB database.
content.html: To be able to experiment with the code examples, you will need access to a MongoDB database.

content.text: You can download a free MongoDB database at https://www.mongodb.com .
content.html: You can download a free MongoDB database at https://www.mongodb.com.

content.text: Or get started right away with a MongoDB cloud service at https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas .
content.html: Or get started right away with a MongoDB cloud service at https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas.

content.text: Let us try to access a MongoDB database with Node.js.
content.html: Let us try to access a MongoDB database with Node.js.

content.text: To download and install the official MongoDB driver, open the Command Terminal and execute the following:
content.html: To download and install the official MongoDB driver, open the Command Terminal and execute the following:

content.code_html: C:\Users\Your Name>npm install mongodb

content.text: Now you have downloaded and installed a mongodb database driver.
content.html: Now you have downloaded and installed a mongodb database driver.

content.text: Node.js can use this module to manipulate MongoDB databases:
content.html: Node.js can use this module to manipulate MongoDB databases:

content.code_html: var mongo = require('mongodb');
